targets.query: SELECT mean("defense_bot_threat_rating_actual") FROM "statistics" WHERE ("identifier" =~ /^$identifier$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "identifier" WHERE "sumatra.version" =~ /$sumatraVersion/ AND "team.name" =~ /$teamName/  AND "team.color" =~ /$teamColor/
list.label: Identifier
list.name: identifier
